Container.Name: PokemonGo-Map
Container.Overview: Live visualization of all pokemon (with option to show gyms and pokestops) in your area. This is a proof of concept that we can load all nearby pokemon given a location. Currently runs on a Flask server displaying a Google Map with markers on it..
Container.Description: Live visualization of all pokemon (with option to show gyms and pokestops) in your area.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Environment Vars:[/span][/b][br] [b]AUTH_SERVICE:[/b]: google, ptc. [b]USERNAME[/b]: Your Username. [b]PASSWORD[/b]: Your Password. [b]LOCATION[/b]: The default location to use. [b]STEP_LIMIT[/b]: The stemp limit to use, defaults to 15. [b]GMAPS_KEY[/b]: Your google maps key. [b]AUTO_REFRESH[/b]: The auto refresh interval, defaults to 30 seconds. [b]DISPLAY_POKESTOPS[/b]: Displays the pokestops, defaults to 0. [b]DISPLAY_LURED[/b]: Displays the lured pokestops only, defaults to 0. [b]DISPLAY_GYMS[/b]: Displays the gyms, defaults to 0. [b]IGNORE[/b]: Comma separated list of Pokemon names or IDs to ignore. [b]ONLY[/b]: Comma separated list of Pokemon names or IDs to only list. [b]LOCALE[/b]: Locale for Pokemon names, defaults to en. [b]CHINA[/b]: Coordinates transfer for China, defaults to 0. [b]DEBUG[/b]: Debug mode, defaults to 0. [b]MOCK[/b]: Mock mode, defaults to 0.
